Electric.name: Switch Replacement
description: Flat Rs 99 visitation fee per booking
included: Labour charges for inspection and replacement of one single switch
Procurement of spare part (at extra cost)
Minor wiring up to 2m, if needed (wire at extra cost)
Clean-up after service
excluded: Electronic appliance services & masonry work
Procurement of spare parts
